description: This file defines a React component for a 'Forgot Password' page, enabling users to request a password reset via email. It uses hooks for state management, React Router for navigation, and a custom AuthContext for authentication functionality.

methods.name: ForgotPassword
methods.description: React functional component for the password reset page, managing form state and handling password reset requests.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Event handler for form submission that triggers password reset process.
